subject: RGB pedal plate not supplied with cable.
description_text:
Hi,

Bought your pedal plate from ALIEXPRESS, with RGB lights but no way to connect RGB to system to get to work, no where is this stated in the ad or your website very annoyed and disappointed. Want partial refund for false advertising. ALIEXPRESS order ID 8205852463822888.

conversations.body_text:
Hi then all your advertisement is false no where does it state this. In fact in all images of the plate alone it shows it lit up how am I to know this? If your not willing to issue a 30% refund I will complain to AliExpress

Regards
Miles Rogge
0401541011
________________________________
